tutorials.title: Lab 1: Provision an ADW and create user
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will provision an ADW instance and create a database user.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Load JSON tweets
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will load JSON Tweets.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Sentiment analysis with Oracle Text
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will analyse sentiment with Oracle Text.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Load transactional data on Blockchain table
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will load Transactional Data on Blockchain table.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Use Spatial to analyze tweets location
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will analyse using Spatial if bad comments are far from the warehouse.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Create an insight application with APEX
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will show the customers willing to churn and visualize the influencers by using APEX.

tutorials.title: BONUS CONTENT - Lab 7: Predict customer churn with AutoML
tutorials.description: In this Lab you will combine Ecommerce Transactional data with Twitter info, to predict if customer is going to 'churn' by cancelling their premium card.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
